imdb.plot outline: A novel documentary series in Chilean television that deals with the stories of seniors living "their old age" as the best stage of their lives. A program about the meaning of the last chapter we write in this world that unveils an "invisible" world in the eyes of modern society.
imdb.title: Viejo Zorro
plot: A novel documentary series in Chilean television that deals with the stories of seniors living "their old age" as the best stage of their lives. A program about the meaning of the last chapter we write in this world that unveils an "invisible" world in the eyes of modern society.::Surreal Películas de la realidad [cl]
